issue.title: [CI] ccache doesn't cache on Travis-CI
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6751](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6751). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Looks like our ccache setup on Travis is broken. This is seen by the cache hits statistics printed at the end of each job.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6751?focusedCommentId=16942340) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5554
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5554>
